content: When looking at the code system for HL7 v2 message structures, I saw an entry for ARD_A19 (noted as deprecated since 2.9). Is this a typo for ADR_A19 (which is also listed), was there an actual misspelled entry that needs to be preserved, or is it something else?
Looks like a typo to me. I'll try and follow up with the PA group and confirm with them.
One is a typo, and the other is deprecated. So we should mark both accordingly.
@Frank Oemig can you pass this along to @Lynn Laakso so that she can add it to the list of technical corrections?
That may have to go to Vocabulary, since this seems to be now part of UTG
is there a change in v2.9 to be made, or only in UTG?
ADR_A19 a great message type. One of the few semi successful HL7v2 queries
What are you thinking @Brendan Keeler , the immunization QBP query is THE v2 query message...
ADR_A19 is very powerful. I doubt that one system has implemented it in total. I am only aware of specific queries as a profile of it.

Very true, QBP is the greatest of all time

Soft spot in my heart for QRY /ADR due to the Dutch community's love for it as an ADT alternative

@a
